Kartia Researcher:
You are the hero who wants to protect the land from the Goddess of Destruction and the creatures of evil? Then you definitely can help us. Demons of Spatial Rift intend to invade our Aden. I was sent here as part of an expedition to study the map of the Kingdom of Aden. We are looking for the daredevil who will attack the demons of the Kartia Labyrinth.
